# pair

𐎔 par pair paraitre = partner 𒉺 PA 𐠞 pa 𐘂 PA 𐀞 pa π 𐎲 𐎔 par פר "bull" in gender ligatures <> 𒁍 púʳ

𐎔 Paarhufer :

𓃀𓃀 𒁍𒊑𒁺 pu-ri-du | leg | पैर pair

1 pair 𓃀𓃀 = feet 𓃀 (perna پیر 발 पैर פָּרַס)
2 pair both binary : 𓃀 𓈖 𓏏 𓏮 𓂒 𓂒 | pair of breasts, nipples | bin*2 tittis = 𓏏𓏏𓏮𓂒 ☑

pair < part

𓃀 ⲫⲁⲧ ⋍ ⲣⲁⲧ prat
𓃀 پیر pair | Urdu
𓃀 पैर pair | Hindi
𓃀 perna Latin => pierna Spanish

𒂍𒉺𒈾 e₂paʳna perna > pair, front 𒂊𒉺𒈾 e-paʳna 𒂊𒁀𒀭 e-baʳan 𒂍𒁀𒀭 e₂baʳan 𒂍𒁀 e₂baʳ a-pair

𒋰 dab₂ #tāpalu doppel double •di-pair
